| Overview                = The '''Ophanim''',  '''Orphanim''', '''Thrones''',{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}} or '''Council of Thrones''',{{r|Wolverine/Punisher Revelation #1}} are the second choir of [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]] per their hierarchy in [[Judaism]], and a choir of the [[First Sphere]] per [[Christianity]]'s hierarchy, along with the [[Seraphim (Angels) (Earth-616)|Seraphim]] and [[Cherubim (Angels) (Earth-616)|Cherubim]].{{r|Marvel Zombies: The Book of Angels, Demons & Various Monstrosities #1|; [[Angels (Monotheism)|Angels]]' entry}}
